Verses: 1 karththarudaiya Vaarththai Enakku Undaagi, Avar:
2 manupuththirane, Ore Thaayin Kumaaraththigalaagiya Irandu Sthreegal Irundhaargal.
3 avargal Egipthile Vesiththanampanninaargal; Thangal Ilampraayaththile Vesiththanampanninaargal; Ange Avargaludaiya Sthanangal Amukkappattu, Avargaludaiya Kannimaiyin Kongaigal Thodappattadhu.

4 avargalil Mooththavalin Peyar Akolaal, Avaludaiya Thangaiyin Peyar Akolibaal; Avargal Ennudaiyavargalaagi, Kumaararaiyum Kumaaraththigalaiyum Petraargal; Ivaigale Avargaludaiya Peyargal; Akolaal Enbadharku Samaariyaa Endrum Akolibaal Enbadharku Erusalem Endrum Porulaam.
5 akolaal Ennudaiyavalaayirukkumpodhu Soramponaal.
6 neelaambaranthariththa Thalaivarum, Adhipadhigalum, Sowndhariya Vaalibarum, Kudhiraigalinmel Erugira Veerarumaayirundha Sameebadhesaththaaraagiya Aseeriyar Engira Than Snegidharmel Aval Mogiththu,
7 aseeriyarin Puththiraril Sreshtamaana Anaivarodum, Thaan Mogiththa Anaivarodum Than Vesiththanangalai Nadappiththu, Avargaludaiya Naragalaana Sagala Vikkiragangalaalum Theettuppattupponaal.

8 thaan Egipthile Pannina Vesiththanangalai Aval Vidavillai; Avargal Avaludaiya Vaalibaththile Avalode Sayaniththu, Avaludaiya Kannimaiyin Kongaigalaith Thottu, Avalidaththil Thangal Vesiththanaththai Nadappiththaargal.
9 aagaiyaal Avaludaiya Snegidharin Kaiyile, Aval Mogiththirundha Aseeriyapuththirarin Kaiyile, Naan Avalai Oppukkoduththen.

10 avargal Avalai Nirvaanamaakkinaargal; Avaludaiya Kumaararaiyum Avaludaiya Kumaaraththigalaiyum Siraipidiththu, Avalaiyo Pattayaththinaal Kondrupottaargal; Appadiye Avalidaththil Aakkinaigal Seyyappattapadiyinaal Sthreegalukkul Avakeerththiyullavalaanaal.
11 avaludaiya Thangaiyaagiya Akolibaal Idhaik Kandum, Than Mogavigaaraththil Avalaip Paarkkilum Kettavalaanaal; Than Sagodhariyin Vesiththanangalilum Than Vesiththanangal Adhigamaayitru.
12 magaa Alangaara Uduppulla Thalaivarum Adhipadhigalum, Kudhiraigal Erugira Veerarum, Sowndhariyamulla Vaalibarumaana Sameebadhesaththaaraagiya Aseeriya Puththirarmel Mogankondaal.
13 avalum Asuththamaanaalendrum, Avargal Iruvarum Ore Vazhiyilponaargalendrum Kanden.
14 aval Than Vesiththanangalil Adhigariththaal; Suvaril Jaadhilingaththaal Siththirantheerndha Kaldheyarin Purusha Suroobangalaik Kandaal.

15 avargal Ellaarum Thangal Jenmadhesamaagiya Kaldheyaavilulla Baabilon Puththirarin Saayalaagath Thangal Araigalil Kachchai Kattinavargalum Thangal Thalaigalil Saayantheerndha Periya Paagaigalaith Thariththavargalum, Paarvaikku Raajakumaarargalumaaga Irundhaargal.
16 avaludaiya Kangal Avargalaip Paarththavudane, Aval Avargalmel Mogiththu, Kaldheyaavukku Avargalandaiyile Sthaanaapadhigalai Anuppinaal.

17 appozhudhu Baabilon Puththirar Avalandaiyile Snega Sambogaththukku Vandhu, Thangal Vesiththanangalaal Avalaith Theettuppaduththinaargal; Aval Ivargalaal Theettuppattuppona Pinbu, Aval Manadhu Avargalai Vittup Pirindhadhu.
18 ivvidhamaai Aval Than Vesiththanangalai Velippaduththi, Thannai Nirvaanamaakkinapodhu, En Manam Avaludaiya Sagodhariyai Vittup Piriththadhupola Avalaiyum Vittup Pirindhadhu.
19 aval Egipthudhesaththile Vesiththanam Pannina Than Vaalibaththin Naatkalai Ninaiththu, Than Vesiththanangalil Adhigariththupponaal.
20 kazhudhaimaamsamaana Maamsamum, Kudhirai Indhiriyamaana Indhiriyamumulla Avargalukku Aval Vaippaattiyaayirukkumpadi Avargalmel Mogiththaal.
21 egipthiyaraal Un Kannimaiyin Sthanangalaagiya Kongaigal Thodappatta Kaalaththil, Nee Un Ilampraayaththil Seydha Muraikedugalai Ninaiththuvarugiraai.

22 aagaiyaal, Akolibaale, Karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal: Idho, Un Manadhuvittup Pirindha Un Snegidharai Naan Unakku Virodhamaaga Ezhuppi, Unakku Virodhamaaga Avargalai Sutrilumvarappannuven.

23 sowndhariyamulla Vaalibarum, Thalaivarum Adhipadhigalum, Kudhiraigalmel Erugira Veerarumaagiya Perpetra Prabukkalaana Baabilon Puththiraraiyum, Kaldheyar Ellaaraiyum, Pekodu, Sovaa, Kovaa Engira Dhesangalin Manusharaiyum Avargalodekooda Aseeriya Puththirar Ellaaraiyum Varappannuven.

24 avargal Vandilgalodum, Radhangalodum Yandhirangalodum, Janakkoottaththodum, Kedagangalum Parisaigalum Thalaichcheeraakkalum Thariththavargalaai, Unakku Virodhamaaga Vandhu, Unnai Sutrilum Paalayamiranguvaargal; Avargalukku Munne Naan Nyaayaththai Vilangappannuven; Avargal Thangal Nyaayangalinpadi Unnai Nyaayantheerppaargal.

25 unakku Virodhamaaga En Erichchalai Vilangappannuven; Avargal Unnai Ukkiramaai Nadappiththu, Un Mookkaiyum Un Kaadhugalaiyum Aruththuppoduvaargal; Unnil Meedhiyaayiruppavargal Pattayaththaal Vettundupovaargal; Avargal Un Kumaararaiyum Un Kumaaraththigalaiyum Pidiththukkolluvaargal; Unnil Meedhiyaayiruppavargal Akkinikku Iraiyaavaargal.
26 avargal Un Vasthirangalai Urindhu, Un Singaaramaana Aabaranangalaip Pariththukkolluvaargal.
27 ivvidhamaai Un Muraikettaiyum, Nee Egipthudhesaththil Thuvakkina Un Vesiththanaththaiyum Ozhiyappannuven; Nee Ini Avargalai Nokka Un Kangalai Eredukkaamalum, Egipthuvai Ninaiyaamalum Iruppaai.
28 karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal: Idho, Nee Pagaikkiravargalin Kaiyilum, Un Manam Vittup Pirindhavargalin Kaiyilum Naan Unnai Oppukkoduppen.

29 avargal Unnai Veruppaai Nadaththi Un Prayaasaththin Palanaiyellaam Eduththukkondu, Unnai Ammanamum Nirvaanamumaakkividuvaargal; Appadiye Un Vetkakkedum Un Muraikedumaana Un Vesiththanaththin Nirvaanam Velippaduththappadum.
30 nee Purajaadhigalaip Pinthodarndhu, Avargaludaiya Naragalaana Vikkiragangalaal Unnaith Theettuppaduththikkonda Un Vesiththanaththinimiththam Ivaigal Unakku Seyyappadum.
31 un Sagodhariyin Vazhiyile Nee Nadandhaai; Aagaiyaal Avaludaiya Paaththiraththai Un Kaiyile Koduppen.
32 karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal: Nee Un Sagodhariyinudaiya Aazhamum Agalamumaanadhum Niraiya Vaarkkappattadhumaana Paaththiraththaik Kudiththu, Nagaippum Pariyaasamumaavaai.
33 samaariyaa Ennum Un Sagodhariyinudaiya Paaththiramaayirukkira Bramippum Paazhkkadippum Engira Paaththiraththaal Veriyinaalum Sanjalaththinaalum Niraiyappaduvaai.
34 nee Adhil Irukkiradhaik Kudiththu, Urinji, Adhin Odugalai Udaiththuppottu, Un Sthanangalaik Keerikkolvaai; Naan Idhai Sonnen Endru Karththaraagiya Aandavar Uraikkiraar.
35 aagaiyaal, Nee Ennai Marandhu, Ennai Unakkup Purambe Thallivittadhinimiththam, Nee Un Muraikettaiyum Un Vesiththanangalaiyum Sumappaai Endru Karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiraar.
36 pinnum Karththar Ennai Nokki: Manupuththirane, Nee Akolaalaiyum Akolibaalaiyum Kuriththu Vazhakkaada Manadhaanaal, Avargaludaiya Aruvaruppugalai Avargalukkuth Theriyakkaattu.

37 avargal Vibasaarampanninaargal, Avargal Kaigalil Raththamum Irukkiradhu; Avargal Thangal Naragalaana Vikkiragangalode Vibasaarampanni, Thaangal Enakkup Petra Thangal Pillaigalaiyum Avaigalukku Iraiyaagath Theekkadakkappanninaargal.
38 andriyum Avargal En Parisuththa Sthalaththai Annaaliledhaane Theettuppaduththi, En Oivunaatkalaip Parisuththakkulaichchalaakkinaargal.

39 avargal Thangal Pillaigalaith Thangal Naragalaana Vikkiragangalukkendru Paliyittapinbu, Avargal En Parisuththa Sthalaththaip Parisuththakkulaichchalaakka Annaalildhaane Adharkul Pravesiththaargal; Idho, En Aalayaththin Naduvile Ippadi Seydhaargal.

40 idhuvumallaamal, Dhooraththilulla Purusharidaththirkuth Thoodhu Anuppi, Avargalai Varavazhaiththaargal, Avargal Vandhaargal; Avargalukkendru Nee Kuliththu, Un Kangalil Maiyittukkondu, Aabaranangalaal Unnai Alangariththu,
41 sirandha Manjaththinmel Utkaarndhukondaai; Adhin Munne Oru Peedam Aayaththampannappattirundhadhu; En Thoobavarkkaththaiyum En Enneyaiyum Adhinmel Vaiththaai.

42 avalidaththile Andha Sandhadiyin Iraichchal Adangina Pinbu, Janaththiralaana Purusharaiyum Azhaiththanuppinaargal; Sabeyar Vanaandharaththilirundhu Konduvarappattaargal; Ivargal Avargaludaiya Kaigalil Kadagangalaiyum Avargaludaiya Thalaigalil Alangaaramaana Kreedangalaiyum Pottaargal.
43 vibasaarangalil Kizhaviyaanavalaikkuriththu Aval Innum Than Vesiththanangalai Seyvaalo Endren.
44 parasthreeyinidaththile Pravesikkumaappola Avalidaththil Pravesiththaargal; Indhappragaaramaaga Muraikedaanavargalaagiya Akolaalidaththilum Akolibaalidaththilum Pravesiththaargal.

45 aagaiyaal, Vibasaarigalai Nyaayantheerkkira Pragaaramaagavum, Raththanchindhum Sthreegalai Nyaayandheerkkira Pragaaramaagavum Needhimaangal Avargalai Nyaayantheerppaargal; Avargal Vibasaarigal, Avargaludaiya Kaigalil Raththam Irukkiradhu.
46 karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal: Naan Avargalukku Virodhamaai Oru Koottaththaivarappanni, Avargalai Alaichchalukkum Kollaikkum Oppukkoduppen.

47 andhak Koottaththaar Avargalaik Kallerindhu, Thangal Pattayangalaal Vettip Poduvaargal; Avargaludaiya Kumaararaiyum Avargaludaiya Kumaaraththigalaiyum Kondru, Avargaludaiya Veedugalai Akkiniyaal Sutterippaargal.
48 ivvidhamaai Ellaa Sthreegalum Buththiyadaindhu, Ungal Muraikedugalai Seyyaadhirukkumpadi, Muraikettai Dhesaththaivittu Ozhiyappannuven.
49 ungal Muraikettai Ungalmel Sumaththuvaargal; Appozhudhu Neengal Ungal Naragalaana Vikkiragangalai Seviththa Paavangalai Sumandhu, Naan Karththaraagiya Aandavar Endru Arindhukolveergal.
